original_title: Metallica: Day on the Green & Metal Hammer Festival '85
overview: Ride The Lightning Official Release, Exclusive Box DVD:  - LIVE AT THE METAL HAMMER FESTIVAL IN ST. GOARSHAUSEN, GERMANY, SEPTEMBER 14, 1985  - LIVE AT MTV'S DAY ON THE GREEN AT OAKLAND STADIUM, OAKLAND, CA, AUGUST 31, 1985  - DANISH TV SPECIALS
title: Metallica: Day on the Green & Metal Hammer Festival '85
